Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie and 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Western, 99th, Kedzie and 103rd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 103rd/Sacramento.

Headline: Green and Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include:
#29 State
#62 Archer

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
